Warm-up

Perform the following computations with 8-bit signed integers

Q1: 0b10100011 + 7

Q2: 48 - 0b01100001

Q3: 0b00100000 + 0b01100000

Bitwise operators

Q4: 0b1010 | 0b0101

Q5: 0b1010 & 0b0101

Q6: ~(0b1100 & 0b0110)

Q7: 0b1000 >> 0b011

Bitwise operators (continued)

Q8: 0b0001 << 0b0010

Q9: 0b1111 & (~0b0010)

Q10: 0b0000 | 0b0010

Extra practice

How many bytes of memory are reserved for each of the following variables? Q11: int a;

Q12: unsigned int b;

Q13: char c;

Q14: long long d;

Q15: int e[5];

Q16: char f[30];

Extra practice

Compute the following powers of two Q17: 2^4

Q18: 2^6

Q19: 2^8

Q20: 2^10

Q21: 2^12

Q22: 2^16
